0010000100111001 0110000010111010 1 -> sum: 1000000111110100, cout: 0
1110110010011110 1101001101111101 1 -> sum: 1100000000011100, cout: 1
0010001010011001 1110100010000001 0 -> sum: 0000101100011010, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
